message:
Good morning, %name%!
Have a nice day!
farawell: That's everything for today... See you tomorrow!
plugin_notice: You should get some messages from you activated plugins soon. You can edit your plugins with `%prefix%plugins`
why_getting_this_message: This is the first time you are online today, so I thought I send you a message :+1:
unsubscribe: Don't want to get this messages anymore? Write `%prefix%unsubscribe`
to_the_first_message: That was really a lot. You can click this link to get to the first message:
